unicef-spe7.def: Percentage of income received by the 20 per cent of households with the highest income, by the 40 per cent of households with the lowest income and by the 20 per cent of households with the lowest income.
unicef-spe7.name: Share of household income
unicef-spe7.source: World Development Indicators. Last update: February 2021.
unicef-spe7.dataset: World Development Indicators. Last update: February 2021.
